[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@genesislcap/foundation-comms](./foundation-comms.md) &gt; [Session](./foundation-comms.session.md)

## Session interface

Represents a session storage and its capabilities. Provides methods to set and get items from the specified storage.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Session 
```

</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The return URL for the session.


</td></tr>
